column4: Can someone please help me with this 'easyinstall.sh' (apprently not so) script for installing e-17 from CVS?
thats the link to the error messages
you need gtk libs installed. try sudo apt-get install libgtk2.0-dev
installed, still giving off the same error.
could it be a problem with my paths? perhaps in need of editing by hand?
the script may depend on version 1 i guess - try also sudo apt-get install libgtk1.2-dev
now, i am getting an even more cryptic message about automake not supporting module_la_KDFLAGS. http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/13621
sorry to be a bother...but can you please lend a helping hand as to what this means? is there any other way i can isntall e-17?
here's the updated error messages: http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/13621
1) what is it? 2) there are no errors in the pastebin you pasted. warnings aren't critical

ooookay- but these warnings seems to have led to the error...they were taken from /tmp/easy_e17/install_logs/evas.log- and it does say 'ERROR' next to evas...i know, its really getting to be a pain isnt it-
could you give me more details about the error line/s please?
her's the output of the entire evas log: http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/13625
only 40 lines are appearing in the pastebin - there might be a limit on how much is pasted
would you mind pasting say the last 15 lines?
